Control Name: Disposes of, Destroys, and Redacts Personal Information—Personal information no longer retained is anonymized, disposed of, or destroyed in a manner that prevents loss, theft, misuse, or unauthorized access.

control_attributes.Control: Disposes of, Destroys, and Redacts Personal Information—Personal information no longer retained is anonymized, disposed of, or destroyed in a manner that prevents loss, theft, misuse, or unauthorized access.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P4.3 The entity securely disposes of personal information to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy
